inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('DualWieldStrDamage', 'Stackable', 2); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Expert Dual Wielding
description: You gain an additional +2 damage bonus per point of Strength above 10 with both weapons while dual wielding, mostly offsetting the dual wielding damage penalties.
